\usepackage{geometry}
\usepackage{xparse}
\usepackage{xcolor}
\usepackage{mdframed}
\usepackage{multicol}

\usepackage{showframe}
\renewcommand*\ShowFrameColor{\color{watermelon}}

\graphicspath{ {img/} }

\geometry{
a4paper,
left=0.4in,
right=0.2in,
top=0.2in,
bottom=0.2in,
headheight=0.0in
}

\NewDocumentCommand \scorecardGeometry{}{
  \geometry{
    a4paper,
    left=0.2in,
    right=0.2in,
    top=0.2in,
    bottom=0.2in,
    headheight=0.0in
  }
}

\definecolor{esLightGray}{HTML}{F2F2F2}
\definecolor{watermelon}{HTML}{B4Da55}
\definecolor{candy}{HTML}{f42069}


\NewDocumentCommand \exposureImage{}{
  \fbox{\textbf{exposure}}
}

\NewDocumentCommand \alignmentImage{}{
  \fbox{\textbf{alignment}}
}


\NewDocumentCommand \engagementImage{}{
  \fbox{\textbf{engagement}}
}

\mdfdefinestyle{esstyle}{
  frametitlebackgroundcolor = esLightGray
}


\mdfdefinestyle{debugstyle}{
  frametitlebackgroundcolor = watermelon,
  linecolor = candy,
  linewidth = 2pt
}

\NewDocumentCommand \esboxTitleString{ m o }{
  % FIXME: load in images
  #1%
  \IfValueT{#2}{\hfill \textbf{#2}}
}

\NewDocumentEnvironment{esbox}{ O{\textwidth} m o }
{% begin code
  \begin{minipage}[t]{#1}%
  \begin{mdframed}[style=esstyle, frametitle={\esboxTitleString{#2}[#3]}]%
}
{ % enddef
  \end{mdframed}%
  \end{minipage}%
}%
